name: Mario Kart Game
description:
Derived from ShinyKinlex, that's all.

If error occurs, reload the page

W - Move Forward

A/D - Turn Left/Right

Space - Trick

You can trick on blue, yellow, and pink pads

Orange - Speed Boost

Yellow - Jump

Blue - Wave/Jump

Pink - Larger Jump

If you have beef with the game/or me contacts on my profile.

my opinion will arrive within 1 to 5 business days
